inclusion.criterion: reside in Darwin, Maningrida, Wadeye or the Tiwi Islands
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: intends to deliver child at the Royal Darwin Hospital
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: intends to deliver child at the Royal Darwin Hospital

inclusion.criterion: has given informed consent to participate
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: had 23vPPV within the previous three years
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: had a previous dose of dTpa
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: intends to leave the study area during the follow-up period
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no indication of leaving the area

notes: A 5 months old male with undescended testis, otherwise healthy and normal development.
